document_name: Presidential Agreement No. 146/98 on the Restoration and Protection of the Forest Heritage
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/NIC/1998/NIC-1998-05-06-Presidential Agreement No. 146_98 on the Restoration and Protection of the Forest Heritage_83de45f48cf7648aa75f63285d3a1053.pdf
document_description: Provides that forest incentive policies shall be developed, proposing, among others, measures for carbon sequestration and a Nicaraguan Clean Development Commission to mitigate the effects of climate change.
